titleStmt.title: The speech of His Grace, James Duke of Ormond, Lord Lievtenant of Ireland, to both Houses of Parliament, on Saturday the 27 of September, 1662 upon His Graces giving the royal assent to severall acts of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.
England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
